entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Near blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
